description: 351 Communications Professional Services not Elsewhere Specified
extraDescription: To provide real-time access to TV, print, online and social media content relating to ESDC ministers and/or content related to ESDC and its portfolios. The contract sets out the services provided by CNW, the number of licenses available to the department and the costs to be incurred on a yearly basis by ESDC (in addition to standard legal provisions, etc).Mediavantage is the service used by Media Services to provide video clips and/or transcripts (derived from closed captioning) to the ministers' offices.
